Sounds like sheâ€™s definitely been cheated on before or been in a super distrusting relationship before you got together. Try talking to her and letting her know calmly that you arenâ€™t any of the people who have caused her that kind of pain, that you love her and understand why she may be feeling that way if sheâ€™s been cheated on before, ( if she has been cheated on before of course). That, again, the girls are friends and have been important in your life as friends only, then ask her to look at it a different way, for example like what if you were asking her to stop talking to a good friend.
